Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: A test is coming up. How do you study for it?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Stai per affrontare un esame come ti prepari?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Can you focus on something you like?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Riesci a concentrarti su qualcosa che ti piace?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: When the going gets tough, do you get going?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Quando il gioco si fa duro, ce la metti tutta?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: There is a bucket. If you put water in it, how high will you fill it?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Devi mettere dell'acqua in un secchio. Quanto lo riempi?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You are offered a choice of two gifts. Which one will you take?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Devi scegliere tra due pacchetti regalo. Quale scegli?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You broke a rotten egg in your room! What will you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Hai rotto un uovo marcio nella tua stanza! Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: A friend brought over something you'd forgotten. How do you thank your friend?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Un amico ti riporta qualcosa che avevi dimenticato. Come lo ringrazi?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: There is a wallet at the side of a road.

answers.text: Turn it in to the police!

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: C'è un portafoglio sul ciglio della strada.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You're going bungee jumping for the first time. Since it's scary, you decide to test the jump with a doll... And the bungee cord snaps! Will you still try to make a jump anyway?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Devi fare bungee jumping per la prima volta.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: There is an alien invasion! What will you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: C'è un'invasione di alieni! Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You valiantly fight the aliens... But, you are defeated... An alien says to you... "YOU HAVE IMPRESSED US. IT WAS A PLEASURE TO SEE. JOIN US, AND TOGETHER WE SHALL RULE THE WORLD." What will you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Combatti coraggiosamente contro gli alieni, ma ti sconfiggono....

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: There is a scream from behind a door! How will you react?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Senti delle urla provenire da dietro una porta! Come reagisci?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: A delinquent is hassling a girl on a busy city street! What will you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Qualcuno sta infastidendo una ragazza per la strada! Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Are you a cheerful personality?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Sei una persona allegra?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you like to noisily enjoy yourself with others?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piace divertirti rumorosamente con gli amici?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: It's the summer holidays! Where would you like to go?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Sono iniziate le vacanze estive! Dove vorresti andare?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: A foreign person has started up a conversation with you. To be honest, you don't have a clue what this fellow is saying. How do you reply?

answers.text: Um... Could you say that again?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Uno straniero ha cominciato una conversazione con te. Non hai la benché minima idea di cosa stia dicendo. Come rispondi?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Have you ever made a pitfall trap?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Conosci la Precipitotrappola?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you like pranks?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piace scherzare?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Are there many things that you would like to do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ci sono molte cose che ti piacerebbe fare?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Your friend is being bullied! What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Qualcuno sta facendo il prepotente con un tuo amico. Come ti comporti?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you like groan-inducing puns?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piacciono gli scherzi di cattivo gusto?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you tend to laugh a lot?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ridi molto?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do others often call you childish?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Gli altri ti considerano infantile?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you like to imagine things for your amusement?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piace immaginarti cose tanto per divertirti?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: A human hand extends out of a toilet! What would you do?

answers.text: Close the lid without a word.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Vedi una mano che fuoriesce dal WC. Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Grab any digit on your left hand with your right hand. Which digit did you grab?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Affera un dito qualunque della tua mano sinistra con la mano destra. Quale dito hai afferrato?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You are suddenly locked inside a pitch-black room! What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti chiudono a chiave in una stanza buia! Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Can you go into a haunted house?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Avresti il coraggio di entrare in una casa infestata dagli spettri?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You receive a gift! But you don't know what's in it. You're curious, so what do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ricevi un pacchetto regalo e non sai cosa c'è dentro.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You win a lottery! What do you do with the money?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Hai vinto alla lotteria! Cosa fai con i soldi?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: You come across a treasure chest! What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Trovi un forziere che potrebbe contenere un tesoro. Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Your friend fails to show up for a meeting at the promised time. What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Un amico non arriva ad un appuntamento all'ora prestabilita. Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Your country's leader is in front of you. How do you speak to him or her?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti ritrovi davanti al Presidente del tuo Paese. Come gli parli?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do others tell you to watch what you say?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Gli altri ti dicono di fare attenzione a ciò che dici?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you think you are cool? Be honest.
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Riesci a ringraziare di tutto cuore qualcuno quando gli sei riconoscente?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you occasionally consider yourself dull and overly cautious?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: A volte pensi di essere un tipo noioso o troppo prudente?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you dream of lounging around idly without much excitement?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: A volte sogni passare il tempo oziando senza far nulla di particolare?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you like to fight?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piace lottare?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you often yawn?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Sbadigli spesso?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Are you often late for school or meetings?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Arrivi spesso tardi a scuola o agli appuntamenti?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you get the feeling that you've slowed down lately?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti sembra di fare le cose più lentamente negli ultimi tempi?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: It is a pleasant day at the beach. How do you feel?

answers.text: I want to go home soon!

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: È una bellissima giornata e sei in spiaggia. Come ti senti?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you fall asleep without noticing?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti succede di addormentarti senza neppure accorgertene?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you feel lonesome when you are alone?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti senti triste quando non hai compagnia?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you hate to be the last person to leave class at the end of a school day?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti dà fastidio essere l'ultima persona a uscire dalla classe quando suona la campanella?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: What do you do with your room's light when you're going to bed at night?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Quando vai a letto di sera, come lasci la luce della tua stanza?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: It's a weekend, but no one will play with you... What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: È il fine settimana, ma non c'è nessuno che giochi con te. Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Do you sometimes run out of things to do all of a sudden?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti capita di non avere più nulla da fare all'improvviso?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: How quickly do you respond to an e-mail?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Quanto impieghi per rispondere a un'e-mail?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: There is a person you like... But there's no opportunity to get close. What do you do?

answers.text: Pull a prank to get attention.

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: C'è una persona che ti piace, ma non hai la possibilità di avvicinarti. Cosa fai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: The road forks to the right and left. You are told there is a treasure on the right side. What do you do?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti trovi a un bivio. Ti dicono che prendendo la via di destra troverai un tesoro. Dove vai?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: On vacation outings, you want to...
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: In vacanza ti piace andare...

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: It's the summer festival! Do you like carnivals?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Ti piace andare al Luna Park d'estate?

Red/Blue Rescue Team.text: Somebody calls you "weird but funny." How does that make you feel?
Red/Blue Rescue Team.text_it: Se qualcuno ti dice che sei un tipo "strano ma divertente", come ti senti?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Have you ever accidentally revealed a personal secret that someone shared with you?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai mai rivelato per sbaglio un segreto che qualcuno ti ha confidato?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: What do you do with your allowance?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Cosa fai con la tua paghetta?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Would you even consider sticking to a plan to do ten sit-ups a day?

answers.text: No! Who'd want to do that?!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Riusciresti a rispettare il proposito di fare 10 addominali al giorno?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: If you don't know something, do you come clean and admit it?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Se non sai una cosa, lo ammetti senza problemi?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: A fortune-teller says that you have a bad future ahead of you. How do you react?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Una cartomante ti dice che ti aspetta un futuro poco roseo. Come reagisci?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You hear a rumor that might make you rich! What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Senti un'indiscrezione che potrebbe fruttarti un bel gruzzoletto. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: How do you blow up a balloon?

answers.text: As close to breaking as possible!

answers.text_it: Non lo faccio mai! E se scoppiasse?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Quanto gonfi un palloncino?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you state your opinion even when it's not what everyone else thinks?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Esprimi la tua opinione anche quando è diversa da quella degli altri?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You want to reveal that you like someone a whole bunch! What do you do?

answers.text: Show it a little by playing together.
Make it obvious...by playing a prank!
answers.text_it: Lo esprimo... con un bello scherzo!

answers.text: State it clearly for all to hear!
answers.text_it: Lo urlo a tutto il mondo!

answers.text: Keep it to myself! It's too risky!
answers.text_it: Non dico niente! E' troppo rischioso!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Vuoi far sapere a qualcuno che ti piace un sacco! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces on you for an interview. What do you do?

answers.text: Yuck it up! Woo-hoo! I'm on TV!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Mentre stai facendo una passeggiata, un reporter ti ferma ad intervistarti. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You feel a burst of happiness! How about expressing it with a little dance?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai un attacco irrefrenabile di felicità! Che ne dici di qualche passo di danza per esprimere la tua gioia?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You see a parade coming down the street. What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Vedi una parata che si svolge per strada. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend tells a joke that's horribly corny! How do you react?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un tuo amico racconta una barzelletta terribilmente vecchia. Come reagisci?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Can you strike up conversations with new people easily?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Attacchi bottone facilmente con le persone che non conosci?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you get injured a lot?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti capita spesso di farti male?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You see a ball on the ground. What do you do?

answers.text: Spiff it up, shiny and new!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Vedi un pallone per terra. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: What do you think of jungle exploration?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti piacerebbe esplorare una giungla?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You discover a secret passage in a basement. What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Scopri un passaggio segreto in un seminterrato. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un tuo amico cade in modo spettacolare! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Have you ever wanted to communicate with aliens from another planet?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti è mai venuta voglia di comunicare con gli abitanti di un altro pianeta?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Have you ever upset a friend when you were just kidding around?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti è mai capitato di offendere un amico quando volevi solo scherzare?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Hey, what's that? There's someone behind you! So...did you look just now?

answers.text: Don't do that! It scared me!
OK, I admit it. You tricked me.
No way, I didn't fall for it.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ehi guarda! C'è qualcuno dietro di te! Dì un po'... hai guardato?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Someone who works at a store suggests an item that isn't quite what you're looking for. But you like this person. What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un commesso in un negozio ti consiglia un oggetto che non fa per te. Però ti sta simpatico. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You run into a new person that you haven't talked to very much before. What do you do?

answers.text_it: Parlo del più e del meno.

answers.text: Make an excuse to get away!
answers.text_it: Me ne vado con una scusa!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Incontri una persona con cui non hai parlato molto. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You think you hear someone call your name. But no one's around...so what was it?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti sembra di setire qualcuno pronunciare il tuo nome. Ma non c'è nessuno in giro... Cosa è stato?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you find yourself jumping to the wrong conclusion a lot of the time?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti capita spesso di arrivare alla conclucione sbagliata?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you change the channels often while watching TV?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Cambi spesso canale mentre guardi la TV?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You find something at a great bargain! What do you do?

answers.text: Think about whether you need it.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Trovi qualcosa in vendita ad un prezzo eccezzionale. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're packing your classroom's snacks for a picnic when you get hungry. What do you do?

answers.text: Hold myself back and pack it all up.
What snacks? They're in my belly!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Stai mettendo in una borsa gli spuntini per un picnic con i tuoi compagni di classe, quando, all'improvviso, ti viene fame. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Are you a rebel at heart?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai uno spirito ribelle?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: When walking in a group, do you tend to be the one at the front?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Quando cammini con altre persone, tendi a stare davanti?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you think that you might be a genius?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Pensi che potresti essere un genio?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Would you feel comfortable stating your opinion to a very important person?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Saresti a tuo agio nell'esprimere la tua opinione a una persona molto importante?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Are you a city person or a country person?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Preferisci la città o la campagna?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're about to take the last cookie when your friend wolfs it down! What do you do?

answers.text: I weep for my lost cookie.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Stai per prende l'ultimo biscotto quando un tuo amico se lo divora con gusto! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You've spent forever stacking dominoes...One more and you're done...OH, NO! You've knocked them over! What do you do?

answers.text: I'm too crushed to start again.
I set up the dominoes again...

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai passato mesi a disporre tessere nel domino... te ne manca una per finire... NO! Le hai fatte cadere tutte! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you get bothered by noise and ruckus around you?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti danno fastidio i rumori e la confusione vicino a te?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You've just stuffed yourself with a good meal when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

answers.text: Eat it. Who cares if I'm stuffed?
answers.text_it: Lo mangio anche se sono pieno.

answers.text: Turn it down. It's too fattening!
Yummy! I love dessert the most!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai appena divorato con gusto un buon pasto quando arriva un dolce delizioso. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

answers.text: Wing it! I'm sure it will be fine!
Test?! I think I have a fever...

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Domani hai una verifica molto importante! Cosa fa?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're eating at a restaurant when you abruptly realize that everyone's gone! What do you do?

answers.text: Alone?! I look for an employee!
I swipe food from other tables!
answers.text_it: Prendo il cibo dagli altri tavoli!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Stai mangiando al ristorante quando ti rendi improvvisamente conto che tutti gli altri se ne sono andati. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you find yourself humming or singing often?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti capita spesso di fischiettare o canticchiare?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: The phone's ringing! What do you do?

answers.text: Ignore it and let it ring.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Il telefono sta suonando! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend seems to be having a fun chat out of earshot. What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti sembra che i tuoi amici stiano avendo una conversazione spassosa, ma non riesci a sentirli. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you like being the center of attention?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti piace essere al centro dell'attenzione?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're told to wait in a big, empty room. What do you do?

answers.text: Cradle my knees and sit in the corner!
answers.text_it: Mi siedo per terra in un angolo!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti dicono di aspettare in una grande stanza vuota. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you have lots of stuff you bought, thinking it was all cool, but don't use anymore?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai un sacco di cose che hai comprato perchè ti sembravano belle, ma che adesso non usi più?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Have you had any hobbies for a long time?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Hai degli hobby che pratichi da tanto tempo?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you cancel plans to meet others at the last second?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti capita spesso di annullare appuntamenti all'ultimo minuto?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you like to do things according to plan?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti piace seguire i piani?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you think that lies are sometimes necessary?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Pensi che a volte sia necessario dire delle bugie?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You spot a deserted ship on the high seas! What do you think the ship holds?

answers.text: Nothing! The ship is merely a mirage!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Avvisti una nave abbandnata in mezzo all'oceano! Secondo te cosa trasporta?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you think that anything goes when it comes to winning?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Pensi che il fine giustifichi i mezzi?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend is crying right in front of you! What made that happen?

answers.text_it: E' stata colpa di un bulletto!

answers.text: My friend fell down, no doubt!
I wonder if it's my fault?
answers.text_it: Non sarà per caso... colpa mia?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un tuo amico sta piangendo di fronte a te! Come mai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Do you often forget to lock the door when you go out?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti dimentichi spesso di chiudere la porta quando esci di casa?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You attend a fine dinner at a friend's house. How do you behave?

answers.text: Enjoy the meal in polite moderation.
Ask to take the leftovers home!
answers.text_it: M porto a casa pure gli avanzi!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un amico ti invita a casa sua per cena. Come ti comporti?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You have to move a heavy suitcase. What will you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Devi spostare una valigia pesante. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You muster your courage and go to a graveyard at night...and see a woman soaked to the skin just standing there! What do you do?

answers.text: So what? It's just a lady.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Ti fai coraggio ed entri in un cimitero di notte... all'improvviso appare una donna sconosciuta dal'aspetto misterioso! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You see a cake that is past its expiration date, but only by one day. What do you do?

answers.text: Think about it briefly, then decide.
Get someone to try it first.
answers.text_it: Prima la offro ad un altro.

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Trovi una merendina che è scaduta il giorno prima. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: Your friend says that your shirt is inside out. What do you do?

answers.text: Say that it's the latest fashion!

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Un tuo amico ti dice che hai messo la maglietta al contrario. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're daydreaming...when your friend sprays you with water! What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Stai sognando ad occhi aperti... quando un tuo amico ti spruzza addosso dell'acqua! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're in a play with friends. What kind of role do you prefer?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Partecipi a una recita con degli amici. Di solito quale ruolo preferisci?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're in class when you realize that you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Sei in classe, quando ti rendi improvvisamente conto di andare in bagno. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're in the final mile of a marathon, but the last stretch is exhausting! What will you do?
Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Sei all'ultimo chilometro di una maratona. Ma è dura e non ce la fai quasi più! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text: You're on a walk when you smell something delicious. What do you do?

answers.text: Try to imagine what it is.
Think about how hungry I am...

Explorers of Time/Darkness.text_it: Mentre stai facendo una passegiata senti un profumino delizioso. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever blurted something out without thinking about the consequences first?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti è mai capitato di parlare senza pensare alle conseguenze?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you want to be taller someday?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Vorresti diventare più alto, un giorno?

Explorers of Sky.text: Once you've decided something, do you see it through to the end?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Quando decidi di fare una cosa, la porti sempre a termine?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever said "Nice to meet you" to someone you met previously?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai mai detto "Piacere" a qualcuno che avevi già conosciuto?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're at a movie theater. What are you there to see?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Sei al cinema. Cosa guardi?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever looked at your reflection in their mirror and thought, "What a cool person!"?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti sei mai guardato allo specchio pensando: "Che tipo tosto!"?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever thought that if you dug into your backyard, you would find a buried treasure?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai mai pensato che scavando in giardino troveresti un tesoro?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you prefer to play outside rather than inside?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti piace di più giocare all'aperto che al chiuso?

Explorers of Sky.text: You discover a beat-up looking treasure chest in some ruins. What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Trovi un vecchio forziere tra le rovine. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever realized you were hogging the conversation?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti è mai capitato di accorgerti di aver monopolizzato la conversazione?

Explorers of Sky.text: When you see a switch, do you have an overwhelming urge to flip it?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Quando vedi un interruttore, hai l'irrefrenabile tentazione di premerlo?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever forgotten you bought something and bought another one?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti è mai capitato di comprare qualcosa dimenticandoti di averlo già?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you think it's important to always aim to be the best?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Pensi che sia importante cercare di essere sempre i migliori?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you want to be famous?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Vorresti essere famoso?

Explorers of Sky.text: If you saw someone do something bad, could you scold them?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Se vedessi qualcuno fare qualcosa di sbagliato, lo rimprovereresti?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever told a joke that just completely fell flat?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai mai raccontato una barzelletta che non ha fatto ridere nessuno?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you like lively parties?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti piacciono le feste movimentate?

Explorers of Sky.text: Are you truly sincere when you apologize?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Sei davvero sincero quando chiedi scusa?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you like karaoke?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti piace il karaoke?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're hiking up a mountain when you reach diverging paths. Which path do you take?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai scalando una montagna e il sentiero si divide. Quale prendi?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend takes a spectacular fall! What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Un tuo amico cade in modo spettacolare! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You have a really important test tomorrow! What do you do?

answers.text: Wing it! I'm sure I'll be fine!
Test?! I think I have a fever...

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Domani hai una verifica molto importante! Cosa fa?

Explorers of Sky.text: Have you ever accidentally called a teacher "Mom" or "Dad"?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti è mai capitato di chiamare la maestra "Mamma" o "Papà"?

Explorers of Sky.text: There's a rumor there's a ghost haunting the school bathrooms! What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Dicono che nei bagni della scuola siano infestati da un fantasma! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're in class when you realize you really have to go to the restroom! What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Sei in classe e ti scappa da matti! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you think you have good study habits?

answers.text: Well, I never lose at sports!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Pensi di dedicarti allo studio con dedizione?

Explorers of Sky.text: What's your studying style?

answers.text: I just cover what I need to do.
I can't really do it alone...
answers.text_it: Non riesco a studiare da solo...

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Come studi di solito?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're packing your classroom's snacks when you get hungry! What do you do?

answers.text: Hold myself back and pack it all up.
What snacks? They're in my belly!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai mettendo via le merende della classe quando ti viene fame. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You see a cake that's past its expiration date, but only by one day. What do you do?

answers.text: Think about it briefly, then decide.
Get someone to try it first.
answers.text_it: Prima la offro ad un altro.

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Vedi una torta scaduta da un giorno solo. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You've stuffed yourself with a good meal when a great dessert arrives. What do you do?

answers.text: Eat it. Who cares if I'm stuffed?
answers.text_it: Lo mangio anche se sono pieno.

answers.text: Turn it down. It's too fattening!
Yum! I love dessert the most!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti sei appena abbuffato, ma arriva un dolce squisito. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend made a meal that tastes terrible. They ask, "How is it?". You say...?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Un amico ti ha preparato un piatto terribile e ti chiede com'è. Tu dici...

Explorers of Sky.text: You're eating at a very fancy restaurant known for its food. Which course do you select?

answers.text_it: Va bene tutto! È tutto buono!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Sei in un ristorante di lusso famoso per la sua cucina. Cosa ordini?

Explorers of Sky.text: Everyone's sharing a dessert, and there's an extra piece. What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: State dividendo un dolce e ne avanza una fetta. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend offers to treat you to dinner. What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Un amico vuole offrirti la cena. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Everyone around you is laughing at something you think is pretty boring. What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Attorno a te si stanno sbellicando dalle risate per qualcosa che tu trovi piuttosto noioso. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you prefer being busy or having a lot of free time?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Preferisci avere molto da fare o avere molto tempo libero?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're about to buy a popular game when someone else gets the last copy! How do you feel?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai per comprare un gioco famoso quando qualcuno prende l'ultima copia! Come ti senti?

Explorers of Sky.text: You run into a new person that you haven't talked to very much before. What do you do?

answers.text_it: Parlo del più e del meno.

answers.text: Make an excuse to get away!
answers.text_it: Me ne vado con una scusa!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Incontri una persona con cui non hai parlato molto. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Good news and bad news... which one do you want to hear first?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ho una notizia buona e una cattiva... quale vuoi sentire prima?

Explorers of Sky.text: Hey, what's that? There's someone behind you! So... did you look just now?

answers.text: Don't do that! You scared me!
OK, I admit it. You tricked me.
No way. I didn't fall for it.

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ehi, guarda! C'è qualcuno dietro di te! Allora... hai guardato?

Explorers of Sky.text: How are your mornings?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Come va la mattina?

Explorers of Sky.text: You've been invited to a wonderful party. It's time for the party to start, but there's nobody there! You think...?

answers.text: Maybe I have the day wrong?

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Sei stato invitato a una festa grandiosa. È ora di iniziare, ma non c'è nessuno! Cosa pensi?

Explorers of Sky.text: You take off your shoes to realize your socks are different colors! What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti togli le scarpe e noti che hai i calzini spaiati! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Did you make any New Year's Resolutions?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai fatto dei buoni propositi per l'anno nuovo?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're in a completely silent assembly when you suddenly hear someone pass gas! How do you react?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: C'è silenzio assoluto in assemblea, quando senti improvvisamente qualcuno fare una puzza! Come reagisci?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're running a marathon, and at the start you fall flat on your face! What will you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai per correre una maratona, ma alla partenza scivoli e sbatti la faccia per terra! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You find something at a great bargain price! What do you do?

answers.text: Think about whether I need it.

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Trovi qualcosa a un prezzo stracciato! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You've been asked to do a difficult task. What will you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti è stato chiesto di occuparti di un incarico problematico. Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You notice a toy you bought for full price yesterday is marked as half the price today! How do you feel?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Un giocattolo che hai pagato a prezzo pieno ieri, oggi costa la metà! Come ti senti?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend is running a little late to meet you. Is that OK?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Il tuo amico è un po' in ritardo. Va bene lo stesso?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you think that, no matter what happens, life goes on?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Pensi che, nonostante tutto, la vita continua?

Explorers of Sky.text: The phone's ringing! What do you do?

answers.text: Ignore it and let it ring.

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Il telefono sta suonando! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend seems to be making plans to hang out, just out of earshot. You think...
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Il tuo amico sta organizzando un'uscita, ma non riesci a sentire bene. Cosa pensi?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you think it's important to be fashionably late?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Pensi che sia importante farsi aspettare un po'?

Explorers of Sky.text: You've won a big raffle ticket! You say...
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai vinto alla lotteria! Cosa dici?

Explorers of Sky.text: Do you think blaming someone else on something you did is sometimes necessary?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Pensi che a volte sia necessario dare la colpa a qualcun altro per qualcosa che hai fatto tu?

Explorers of Sky.text: Your friend suddenly won't listen to you, when everything was fine yesterday. What do you think?

answers.text_it: Ha altre cose per la testa.

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Improvvisamente un tuo amico non ti vuole più sentire. Eppure fino a ieri andava tutto bene. Cosa è successo?

Explorers of Sky.text: You fail miserably! Everyone found out, and they're disappointed in you... what do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Hai fallito miseramente! Lo sanno tutti e sono delusi da te... Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You want to reveal you like someone a whole bunch! What do you do?

answers.text: Make it obvious by... playing a prank!
answers.text_it: Lo faccio capire... facendogli uno scherzo!

answers.text: State it clearly for all to hear!
answers.text_it: Lo urlo a tutto il mondo!

answers.text: Keep it to myself! It's too risky!
answers.text_it: Non dico niente! E' troppo rischioso!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Vuoi far sapere a qualcuno che ti piace un sacco! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: The people at the next table are singing for someone's birthday. What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Al tavolo vicino stanno cantando "Tanti auguri". Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You're on a stroll when a TV crew pounces you for an interview! What do you do?

answers.text: Yuck it up! Woo-hoo! I'm on TV!

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai passeggiando quando una troupe TV ti salta addosso per un'intervista! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You see a big and comfortable bed. Your first reaction is to...
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Vedi un grosso letto che ha tutta l'aria di essere comodo. La tua prima reazione è...

Explorers of Sky.text: You're daydreaming... when your friend sprays you with water! What do you do?
Explorers of Sky.text_it: Stai sognando a occhi aperti... quando un tuo amico ti spruzza addosso dell'acqua! Cosa fai?

Explorers of Sky.text: You've been handed a large bag as a souvenir. What do you do?

answers.text: Wait until I get home to open it.
answers.text_it: Aspetto di essere a casa per aprirla.
È più piccola di quella degli altri...

Explorers of Sky.text_it: Ti hanno dato una busta grossa come souvenir. Cosa fai?
